scripts.build-all: npm run build-docs && npm run build-css
scripts.watch-all: pulp -w --then 'npm run build-css' build -I docs/src --to docs/example.js
scripts.postinstall: bower i --silent && cd docs/css && npm install && cd ../../ && pulp build
scripts.clean: rm -rf output bower_components node_modules && cd docs/css && rm -rf node_modules
